item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 9, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Rewriting essential Linux packages in Rust (37 points | 11 comments)
2. Show HN: Evolving Agents Framework (45 points | 6 comments)
3. It is as if you were on your phone (266 points | 39 comments)
4. Improving on std:count_if()'s auto-vectorization (77 points | 18 comments)

6. PurrCrypt: Steganographic encryption disguised as pet sounds (45 points | 10 comments)
7. Nickel superconductor works above -233°C threshold at normal pressure (37 points | 8 comments)
8. My 16-month theanine self-experiment (628 points | 331 comments)
9. 16-Bit to 1-Bit: Visual KV Cache Quantization for Efficient Multimodal LLMs (51 points | discuss)
10. Infisical (YC W23) Is Hiring for Full Stack Engineers in San Francisco ( | hide)

27. Global coffee trade grinding to a halt, hit hard by brutal price hikes (21 points | 7 comments)

29. LFortran compiles PRIMA (56 points | 13 comments)
30. Stem cell therapy trial reverses "irreversible" damage to cornea (183 points | 36 comments)
